extendedInfo.description: Keep precisely within the WIFI hotspot area using  high resolution numeric readouts and a graphical widget.Did you know that the WiFi signal strength increases by a million times from low strength to full strength ? The 4 bar default Android WiFi icon is just not good enough to capture this range. Get a good idea of the WiFi signal strength with the help of this simple app which consists of a compact 1x1 high resolution graphical widget in addition to a detailed WiFi info screen and a convenient status bar notification.Features:-1. WiFi Signal strength in dBm2. Themes with extensive customization3. Access point, Linkspeed, MAC Address, Frequency, IP Address, Gateway, DNS, DHCP, downloaded, uploaded 4. Battery Saving ModePro Features:-1. WiFi Signal strength in ASU and Percentage units.2. Widget Styles - Graphic, Colorbars, Minimalist and Numeric3. Signal Notifications in status barNotes:-1. If the widget is not available in the list of widgets on first install open the list of widgets and change the orientation of the device. This will refresh the widgets list.2. Permissions - The app requires internet permissions for showing the Google ads.3. In battery saving mode the app will not be launched if the widget is tapped. It will just update the widget. If you want to open the app you will have to execute the app from launcher.4.The Pro and Free apps are seperate apps and billed seperately by Google.Give feedback to lakshman5876@gmail.com

reviews.title: Very good. Recommended
reviews.comment: Worth paying the $.99 for the pro version.  Basic free version is great also.

reviews.title: Ok ish
reviews.comment: This widget works fine on 2.4Ghz on my HTC One X, but on 5Ghz every signal is either 33 dBm or no signal. So for me this limits its usefulness
reviews.author: Keith Brazington

reviews.title: Great but missing one key feature
reviews.comment: This app is great but its missing one key feature. Please allow us to choose which app should launch when pressing on the widget or turn on/turn off the wifi. Preferably both options.
reviews.author: Brandon Maynard

reviews.title: Bad resize
reviews.comment: I could before resize the widget and it looked good. I use custom grid with more rows etc with nova launcher. Now the widget look ugly and dont fit.

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: After piles of spyware notice spammers or teasers prom/pting to buy a pro version a app that does what I want, give me the strength of my current wifi connection!!!!!  Be cool if ther was a option to have the neumerical value in the stats bar. I can live with the admob hooks.
